title: mAtA InrameyyA
sahitya:
mAtA InrameyyA engaLukku ini AdhAram yArayyA bhArata


anupallavi

  nIti azhinda koDum mannargaLin EkAdipatya veri taNikka bhArata


caraNam 1    gItaip-poruLAi bhaktiyum shAntiyum upadEsham shei gAndhi aDigAL bhArata
  caraNam 2    unpOl Ora uNmait-turaviyai ulagam oru nALum kaNDaduNDO manam kaninda
 anbE vaDivAi uyar aramE kavacamAi akhilamellAm inbuTrirukka puNya bhUmi
